      static class  Facets.FacetGroupingMethod
      This field switches between grouped field facets counted based on header docs after collapse, or based on number of groups which contain at least one document with a given value of a facet field.

      • getGroupFacets

        public boolean getGroupFacets()
        Returns:
        group facets flag. If true, facets counts are calculated after grouping, otherwise before. Default value is true.

        This flag is only used when Group was specified

      • clone

        public Facets clone()
        Specified by:
        clone in class DslCloneable

      • getGroupingMethod

        public Facets.FacetGroupingMethod getGroupingMethod()
        This field switches between grouped field facets counted based on header docs after collapse, or based on number of groups which contain at least one document with a given value of a facet field. For the list of values see Facets.FacetGroupingMethod.

        Default value is Facets.FacetGroupingMethod.HEADER_DOC.

        Returns:
        facet grouping method
